ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, this makes sense. Plus, let's think about it this way..

The upgrade is likely going to add many new zones, even continents, along
with a couple of races, maybe a class or two. Now, who's going to really
WANT the expansion badly? Probably those who have invested days of time
into their characters and want something new to do! Imagine the outcry if
Verant said "OK, we're going to upgrade Xegony but not Fennin Ro, and
Bristlebane but not Tarew Marr?"

Or, if they created an entirely new server with the upgrade, then what?
We've wasted several months developing characters that are suddenly
obsolete, as far as new things are concerned?

Nah, I have to agree here that Verant certainly has to find a way to slip
the new features right into the existing servers. I'll have no problem
paying $20 for a couple of new continents, and horsies! Wheee!

-- Randy

>Meridian had upgrades every 4 months or so. This way they get an additional
>boost in their cashflow to continue developing. I seriously doubt they will
>have seperate servers, that would be too much of a hassle for them...[hears
>them] Fixed bug A on server 1-10, but the fix didnt work on sever 11-20?
>Nope, they will require us all to upgrade. That way their devel. team keeps
>going in a straight line.
